rows.label: qev040701_MSG0001
rows.name: Worry turn to panic turn to crisis! What next?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0002
rows.name: Meh-meh-meeeh! Someone! Anyone! HELP![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_JNK0010
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev040701_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Nosusu what is wrong.

rows.label: qev040701_JNK0020
rows.name: Calm

rows.label: qev040701_SEL0021
rows.name: Have Nosusu take some deep breaths to calm down.

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0003
rows.name:
This is tale of woe for everyone involved.
But mostly for Nosusu![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0004
rows.name:
Nosusu finally open store selling traditional handicraft,
but customer traffic is terrible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0005
rows.name: At this rate, Nosusu go out of business in no time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0006
rows.name:
*huff* *heave* *pant* *wheeze* *squawk* *hoooonk*
Thanks, friend! Nosusu feel little bit better.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0007
rows.name: Better enough to tell total stranger all about problems![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0008
rows.name:
Nosusu finally open store selling traditional handicraft,
but customer traffic is terrible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0009
rows.name: At this rate, Nosusu go out of business in no time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0010
rows.name:
Nosusu nowhere near ready to close up shop yet,
but what can Nosusu do?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_JNK0090
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev040701_SEL0091
rows.name:
Tell Nosusu that her terrible location is
most likely the cause of her problems.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_JNK0100
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev040701_SEL0101
rows.name:
Ask Nosusu why she wants to
sell handicrafts in the first place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0013
rows.name: Hmm. Friend raises fair point...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0014
rows.name:
But to be truthy, Nosusu really want to open shop in
Dodonga Caravan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0015
rows.name:
Grampypon of friendpon of cousinpon of grampypon of
grannypon of Nosusu ran shop here when grannypon
was young.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0016
rows.name: So this place hold deep meaning for Nosusu.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0017
rows.name:
Grampypon of friendpon of cousinpon of grampypon of
grannypon of Nosusu ran shop here when grannypon
was young.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0018
rows.name:
Nosusu grow up on stories of success of shop.
Stories of how everyone was happy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0019
rows.name:
Grampypon of friendpon of cousinpon of grampypon of
grannypon passed technique of handicraft-making down
to Nosusu.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0020
rows.name:
Spreading those across all of space and time is
lifelong dream of Nosusu![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0021
rows.name:
And Nosusu believe all different races on Mira
will love traditional handicrafts of Nopon.
That is why Nosusu try so hard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0022
rows.name:
But it no use. Dream of Nosusu now lying in tiny,
broken pieces.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0023
rows.name: At this rate, Nosusu have no choice but to close shop.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0024
rows.name:
Technique for making handicrafts will die out with
Nosusu.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0025
rows.name:
If only Nosusu had some signature product that could
draw in crowd.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0068
rows.name:
Hmm... Actually, friend looks familiar.
Nosusu has definitely met friend before![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_JNK0030
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev040701_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Nosusu that you are Tatsu's friend.

rows.label: qev040701_JNK0040
rows.name: Dismiss

rows.label: qev040701_SEL0041
rows.name:
Play dumb and say that you have
never seen Nosusu before.

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0027
rows.name: Oh, right! Human friend knows Tatsu![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0028
rows.name:
Hmm... HMMMMM... Hrrrmmrrmrrrmmrrr...
No, Nosusu has definitely seen friend somewhere.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0029
rows.name: Ah ha! Friend is human friend of Tatsu![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0030
rows.name: Human. Huuuuuman... AH! That perfect![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0031
rows.name:
Friend must understand that handicrafts of Nopon are
terribly unpopular with humans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0032
rows.name:
But humans friends could all wear Nopon hats!
That is simply amazing idea![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0033
rows.name:
With right materials, Nosusu can design hat that all
humans will love![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0034
rows.name: Please help Nosusu with this dream![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_JNK0050
rows.name: Engage

rows.label: qev040701_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Nosusu what sort of hat she aims to make.

rows.label: qev040701_JNK0060
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev040701_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Nosusu what materials she needs.

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0035
rows.name:
Hat made from six noctilucent dragonflies,
some harnenga cotton, and two lava mangoes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0037
rows.name:
Nosusu needs six noctilucent dragonflies,
some harnenga cotton, and two lava mangoes
in order to make fabulous cap.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0038
rows.name: Can Nosusu count on friend?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0039
rows.name:
Friend is very kind for agreeing to help!
Nosusu is eagerly awaiting materials.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0040
rows.name:
Nosusu need noctilucent dragonflies, harnenga cotton,
and lava mangoes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0041
rows.name:
And Nosusu hate to rush, but if friend not hurry,
there may be no shop left to sell hats.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0073
rows.name:
Sales still terrible. If Nosusu not find must-have product
soon, shop of Nosusu will be history.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0074
rows.name: Any luck with materials for Nopon hat, friend?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0042
rows.name:
That all of them! Now Nosusu just need two vibrant
plumes or two fluffy tufts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_JNK0070
rows.name: Balk

rows.label: qev040701_SEL0071
rows.name: Express shock that Nosusu still needs more materials.

rows.label: qev040701_JNK0080
rows.name: Shrug

rows.label: qev040701_SEL0081
rows.name:
Begrudgingly tell Nosusu that you
will see this through to the end.

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0043
rows.name:
Nosusu sorry! But what friend brought so far is just
raw materials.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0044
rows.name:
Without vibrant plumes or fluffy tufts, hat will be
fashion abomination.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0045
rows.name:
Please do Nosusu one last favor.
Fate of entire shop hangs in balance![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0046
rows.name:
Nosusu appreciate impressive patience of friend.
But what friend brought so far is just raw materials.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0047
rows.name:
Without vibrant plumes or fluffy tufts, hat will be
fashion abomination.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0048
rows.name:
Please do Nosusu one last favor.
Fate of entire shop hangs in balance![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0049
rows.name:
Oh-ho-ho-hoooo! Now Nosusu explain how the
hat-making works.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0050
rows.name:
With vibrant plumes, Nosusu can make a bright red
hat. So stylish! So now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0051
rows.name:
But if Nosusu use fluffy tufts, hat will come out tiny.
So cute! So adorable![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0052
rows.name:
Nosusu ask that friend pick whichever one will be more
popular with humans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0053
rows.name: Nosusu put total faith in judgment of friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0054
rows.name:
Nosusu need either two vibrant plumes or
two fluffy tufts. One or the other.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0075
rows.name: Ah, friend is back! Happy day![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0055
rows.name: Did friend find vibrant plumes or fluffy tufts?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0056
rows.name: Yay! Nosusu will use these to make snazzy red hat![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0057
rows.name:
Nosusu hope to keep expanding inventory until shop
is in the black.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0058
rows.name:
Grampypon of friendpon of cousinpon of grampypon
of grannypon is surely happy for Nosusu from great
beyond.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0059
rows.name: Humans sometimes wear hats that look similar to this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0060
rows.name: Nosusu know all about it. They call it...Santa hat![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0061
rows.name:
Now Nosusu start huge sales campaign around new
Nopon Santa hats.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0062
rows.name: Yay! Nosusu will use these to make cute little cap.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0063
rows.name:
Nosusu hope to keep expanding inventory until shop
is in the black.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0064
rows.name:
Grampypon of friendpon of cousinpon of grampypon
of grannypon is surely happy for Nosusu from great
beyond.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0065
rows.name: Humans sometimes wear hats that look similar to this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0066
rows.name:
Nosusu know all about it. They call it...
pom-pom beanie![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040701_MSG0067
rows.name:
Now Nosusu start huge sales campaign around new
Nopon-made pom-pom beanies![ST:wait ]
